headline: Kroger Names Greg Foran CEO As Market Weighs Valuation And Risks
summary: Kroger (NYSE:KR) has appointed Greg Foran as its new CEO following an extensive search. Foran previously led Walmart U.S. and Air New Zealand, with experience in turnarounds, digital initiatives, and culture change. The appointment fills a long standing leadership gap and is a key development for Kroger stakeholders. Kroger enters this leadership transition with its shares at $70.1 and a return of 11.2% over the past week. The stock has also recorded 17.8% over the past 30 days and 128.5%...
